name: Alprazolam

dosing.adult_acute: IR: 0.25-0.5 mg TID PRN; XR: 0.5-1 mg once daily
dosing.adult_maintenance: IR: 0.5-4 mg/day divided TID-QID; XR: 3-6 mg once daily
dosing.notes: Short-acting; rapid onset; high potency; FDA-approved for panic disorder and GAD; XR formulation available

canadian_clinical.starting_dose: IR: 0.25-0.5 mg TID PRN; XR: 0.5 mg once daily
canadian_clinical.titration_schedule: Increase by 0.25-0.5 mg every 3 days if needed
canadian_clinical.max_dose_practice: 4 mg/day typical; higher doses in panic disorder
canadian_clinical.inpatient_strategy: 0.5-1 mg TID-QID PRN for acute anxiety; avoid long-term
canadian_clinical.outpatient_strategy: Start 0.25-0.5 mg BID-TID PRN; time-limited; establish taper plan upfront

warnings: Black box warning: (1) Concomitant use with opioids may result in respiratory depression, coma, death; (2) Abuse, misuse, addiction; (3) Dependence and withdrawal
SHORT half-life (6-12 hours) - multiple daily doses needed; interdose withdrawal
HIGH abuse potential - most commonly misused benzodiazepine
Withdrawal can be severe and protracted - MUST taper slowly
AVOID as first-line - use SSRIs for chronic anxiety management

cautions.renal: Use with caution; metabolites may accumulate
cautions.hepatic: Reduce dose in hepatic impairment; avoid in severe cirrhosis
cautions.pregnancy: Pregnancy Category D - avoid; teratogenic risk
